narrative.narrative: Blue Dart Aviation is a subsidiary of DHL. It is based at Chennai,India and serves 6 other Indian airports on a regular basis. They also offer cargo charters in the region outside of India. They have five 757-200F's and one 737-200. They were founded in 1995 and started operations in 1996 and were originally part of Blue Dart Express, a Mumbai based package distribution company. They were partners with FedEx for a while but joined with DHL on October 1st,2002 and have remained with DHL since. Their first two planes were 737-200's bought from Indian Airlines. Their main time of operation is night, shipping overnight express packages.
